content.text: 0) In a bowl, combine the first seven ingredients.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "combine"@14:21 / AC
		:ppt ( "the first seven ingredients"@22:49 / FOOD
			:ref ( ing-0 )
			:ref ( ing-1 )
			:ref ( ing-2 )
			:ref ( ing-3 )
			:ref ( ing-4 )
			:ref ( ing-5 )
			:ref ( ing-6 )
		)
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a bowl"@6:12 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Crumble turkey over mixture and mix just until combined.
3) Cook in a nonstick skillet coated with nonstick cooking spray until no longer pink.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Cook"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-3-0 "a nonstick skillet coated with nonstick cooking spray"@11:64 / TOOL )
		:until ( cond-3-0 "until no longer pink"@65:85 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)
